description: Top-level schema for job submission request

owner.$comment: User ID under which the job runs

appId.$comment: Unique name of application to be executed

archiveOnAppError.$comment: Whether archiving should proceed even if application reports an error, default=true

dynamicExecSystem.$comment: Whether the best fit execution system should be chosen using execSystemConstraints, default=false

execSystemExecDir.$comment: Directory into which application assets are staged, default=${jobWorkingDir}/jobs/${jobID} where ${jobWorkingDir} = execution system working directory and ${jobID} = uuid of job assigned by Jobs service

execSystemInputDir.$comment: Directory into which input files are staged, default=${jobWorkingDir}/jobs/${jobID} where ${jobWorkingDir} = execution system working directory and ${jobID} = uuid of job assigned by Jobs service

execSystemOutputDir.$comment: Directory into which application writes its output, default=${jobWorkingDir}/jobs/${jobID}/output where ${jobWorkingDir} = execution system working directory and ${jobID} = uuid of job assigned by Jobs service

execSystemLogicalQueue.$comment: Tapis-defined queue that corresponds to a batch queue on the execution system

archiveSystemDir.$comment: Directory into which output files are archived after application execution

nodeCount.$comment: Number of nodes required for application execution, default=1

coresPerNode.$comment: Number of cores to use on each node, default=1

memoryMB.$comment: Megabytes of memory to use on each node, default=100

maxMinutes.$comment: Maximum number of minutes allowed for job execution, default=10

fileInputs.$comment: Input files staged for the application

execSystemConstraints.$comment: Constraints applied against execution system capabilities to validate application/system compatibility

tags.$comment: An array of user-chosen strings that can be associated with a job

appArgs.$comment: Command line arguments passed to the user application

containerArgs.$comment: Command line arguments passed to the container runtime when running a container

schedulerOptions.$comment: Arguments passed to the HPC batch scheduler

envVariables.$comment: Environment variables passed into the application container on start up

archiveFilter.$comment: Output files to include and exclude from archiving, wildcard and regex support, default=all files in execSystemOutputDir
